record.title: CONCLUSION OF MORNING BUSINESS
record.narrative:
CONCLUSION OF MORNING BUSINESS -- (Senate - July 17, 2008)

[Page: S6918]

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, I ask unanimous consent that morning business be closed so that I might file cloture on a motion to proceed to the speculation bill we tried to move on earlier and that once the motion is stated, the Senate return to morning business.

record.chair: Without objection, it is so ordered.
